ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Digest Number 103
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah well for me, I had the tank frist.  She got the nick name the Crying Warrior.  Well because I was lost all the time and crying for help.  I gave her a
ygData.messageBody:
> On Tue, 09 May 2000 19:37:19 K. Bruce wrote:
>i am an avid rp'er, only outside of eq. i am >curious as to how some of >you go about making your characters come to life. >*smiles*
>

Ah well for me, I had the tank frist. She got the nick name the Crying
Warrior. Well because I was lost all the time and crying for help. I
gave her a few fears - Boats, and Heights; to make things interesting.

Now when the cleric came around, I had her be the Tank's twin, and she
hated spiders but was more gental in actions than the tank. I aways
healed folks and still could not find my way around.

When I moved to a new server, I made a wood elf ( Man was I sick of
being Night Blind ) this one is more like a cleric thank a druid.
Always healing and helping, but she always fell out of the the trees in
the Wood Elf City. So she loves to fly and hates spiders.

The Ranalla's
